DOC.brief_summary: To assess the efficacy and safety of Teneligliptin and Linagliptin in the type 2 DM patients.
DOC.brief_title: Teneligliptin Versus Linagliptin in Diabetes Mellitus Type Two Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients who are 19 years or older on screening Patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus Patients with 7.0% ≤ HbA1c ≤ 11.0% at the screening visit Patients with FPG <15mmol/L(270mg/dL) on screening
